AERIALS.name: Aerials
AERIALS.description: DASH range, BLINK range, and HASTE effects increased 75%. PROJECTILES gain 35% travel or cast range.

BUILT DIFFERENT.name: Built Different
BUILT DIFFERENT.description: Gain 30% Size. Your IMPACT abilities hit 10% harder (2% on Core).

BULK UP.name: Bulk Up
BULK UP.description: Gain 300 max Stagger and 1.5 Power per 100 max Stagger.

CAST TO LAST.name: Cast To Last
CAST TO LAST.description: Ability BUFFS and DEBUFFS you cast last 70% longer. CREATIONS last 35% longer.

CATALYST.name: Catalyst
CATALYST.description: Gain 20% more Energy from dealing hits. Being hit generates 6 Energy (2 for LIGHT hits).

CHRONOBOOST.name: Chronoboost
CHRONOBOOST.description: DASH range, BLINK range, and HASTE effects increased 75%. Ability BUFFS and DEBUFFS last 35% longer.

DEADEYE.name: Deadeye
DEADEYE.description: Hit 30% harder (6% to Core) against targets at 600+ range.

EGOIST.name: Egoist
EGOIST.description: Evades refund 10 Energy (20 from Energy Bursts). Reaching max Energy grants 75% Speed for 8s, reducing to 10% speed when you remain at max Energy.

EXTRA SPECIAL.name: Extra Special
EXTRA SPECIAL.description: SPECIAL cooldown reduced by 30%. Each face off its cooldown is reset.

FIRE UP.name: Fire Up
FIRE UP.description: Gain 10 Energy on round start. Casting Energy Burst restores 25% of max Energy to other allies and Speeds up your whole team by 40% for 5s.

GLASS CANNON.name: Glass Cannon
GLASS CANNON.description: Gain 8 Power and 4% Speed every 2.5s (up to 32 Power and 16% Speed). Getting hit resets the timer.

HEAVY IMPACT.name: Heavy Impact
HEAVY IMPACT.description: IMPACT abilities hit 15% harder (3% on Core). Whenever you hit 2 or more targets with a single ability, its cooldown is reduced by 25% (up to 10s).

HOTSHOT.name: Hotshot
HOTSHOT.description: Character abilities hit the Core 15% harder and refund 35% of the ability's cooldown (once per cast).

MISSILE PROPULSION.name: Missile Propulsion
MISSILE PROPULSION.description: PROJECTILES gain 70% travel or cast range and hit 15% harder.

MONUMENTALIST.name: Monumentalist
MONUMENTALIST.description: CREATIONS gain 100% size and hit 15% harder (4% to Core).

ONE TWO PUNCH.name: One Two Punch
ONE TWO PUNCH.description: Hit 30% harder (15% to Core) against targets you've hit within 2.5s.

ORB DANCER.name: Orb Dancer
ORB DANCER.description: Power Orbs increase Speed by 40% for 6s. After collecting 10 without being KOed, this effect is increased to 80%.

ORB PONDERER.name: Orb Ponderer
ORB PONDERER.description: Power Orbs reduce active cooldowns by 25%. After collecting 10 without being KOed, this effect is increased to 45%.

ORB REPLICATOR.name: Orb Replicator
ORB REPLICATOR.description: 50% of benefits from Power Orbs you collect is also granted to allies.

PEAK PERFORMANCE.name: Peak Performance
PEAK PERFORMANCE.description: Gain 300 max Stagger and 0.5% Speed per 100 max Stagger.

PERFECT FORM.name: Perfect Form
PERFECT FORM.description: Hits reduce other ability cooldowns by 15%, up to 1.2s per hit (5%/0.5s for LIGHT hits).

PRIMETIME.name: Primetime
PRIMETIME.description: PRIMARY gains +1 charge and hits 5% harder (2% to Core).

PRIZE FIGHTER.name: Prize Fighter
PRIZE FIGHTER.description: Begin each set with 1 Prize Fighter stack, granting 20 Power. Takedowns grant 1 Prize Fighter stack (max 3 stacks), but getting K.O.'d removes 1 stack. Stacks resets between sets.

QUICK STRIKE.name: Quick Strike
QUICK STRIKE.description: Strike cooldown reduced by 25%. Strike hits grant 2 additional Energy.

REVERBERATION.name: Reverberation
REVERBERATION.description: Gain 300 max Stagger and .8 Cooldown Rate per 100 max Stagger.

SPECIALIZED TRAINING.name: Specialized Training
SPECIALIZED TRAINING.description: SPECIAL hits 55% harder (11% to Core) and heals 55% more.

STACKS ON STACKS.name: Stacks On Stacks
STACKS ON STACKS.description: Hits grant 6 stacks of Speed (0.12% per stack, 24% Speed at Max Stacks, 2 stacks for LIGHT hits). At 100 stacks, double the Speed per stack. Stacks reset when K.O.'d and between sets.

STAGGER SWAGGER.name: Stagger Swagger
STAGGER SWAGGER.description: Gain 8% Speed. While below 50% Stagger, this effect increases to 20% and you heal 150 Stagger per second, including while in the Staggered state.

SUPER SURGE.name: Super Surge
SUPER SURGE.description: DASH range, BLINK range, and HASTE effects increased 75%. These abilities hit 25% harder (5% to Core).

TEMPO SWING.name: Tempo Swing
TEMPO SWING.description: Hitting anything heals you for 5% of your max Stagger (1.66% for LIGHT hits) and deals that amount as damage to the target hit.

TWIN DRIVE.name: Twin Drive
TWIN DRIVE.description: SECONDARY gains +1 charge and has 5% reduced cooldown.

ADRENALINE RUSH.name: Adrenaline Rush
ADRENALINE RUSH.description: Ability cooldowns reduced by 1s. Earning a Takedown increases Speed by 100% for 8s and reduces current cooldowns by 5s.

SPARK OF AGILITY.name: Spark of Agility
SPARK OF AGILITY.description: SPARK - Gain 2% Speed, plus 8% per SPARK you have.

SPARK OF FOCUS.name: Spark of Focus
SPARK OF FOCUS.description: SPARK - Gain 2 Cooldown Rate, plus 10 per SPARK you have.

SPARK OF RESILIENCE.name: Spark of Resilience
SPARK OF RESILIENCE.description: SPARK - Gain 50 max Stagger, plus 200 per SPARK you have.

SPARK OF STRENGTH.name: Spark of Strength
SPARK OF STRENGTH.description: SPARK - Gain 4 Power, plus 20 per SPARK you have.

STINGER.name: Stinger
STINGER.description: Hits deal bonus damage equal to 12% of enemies' max Stagger over 2.5s.

UNSTOPPABLE.name: Unstoppable
UNSTOPPABLE.description: While not staggered, gain 90% knockback resistance and 10% damage reduction.
